NAB_Tutorial_1_NC.content: Look at all the amazing nature art supplies!
Select a tool to get started.

NAB_Pop_In_Toolbar_Backgrounds_Intro_NC.content: Look at these amazing backgrounds to make art on!

NAB_Pop_In_Animation_Options_Tool_Bar_Da.content: Look at all the colors to choose from.

NAB_Pop_In_Animation_Stickers_Squeeks.content: Oh stickers, I just love stickers, you can stick them anywhere

NAB_Pop_In_Animation_Toolbar_Mud_Betters.content: Oooooh, Look at all these art tools we can get messy with!
I get to make art and get dirty at the same time?!
That is win win for me, baby!

NAB_Intro_Animation_1_NC.content: Check out all the amazing art we can make from nature!

NAB_Gallery_4_Hal.content: And tap here to view or customize your art box cover!

NAB_Gallery_Inactivity.content: What say you?! Let’s make some nature art! Aye what?!

NAB_Gallery_1_NC.content: Here’s where you can store and view all your latest creations

NAB_Gallery_2_Squeeks.content: Hey, tap here to start a new masterpiece

NAB_Gallery_3_Daisy.content: Tap on any of the pictures to view or continue working on a previous picture

NAB_Art_Box_Cover_1_NC.content: This is where we can customize the cover of our art box to look just like we want it!

NAB_Tutorial_Options_Tool_Bar_1_Daisy.content: You can choose your colors up here.

NAB_Toolbar_SFX_Rollover_Spider_Daisy.content: An animated spider and web, Sweeeet!

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_Rollover_Mud_Hal.content: We can splatter some mud with this!  Yes!

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_Rollover_Seeds_H.content: Here’s where we can scatter seeds

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_Rollover_Berries.content: We can smoosh colored berries here

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_Rollover_Feather.content: This is where we can add feathers

NAB_Toolbar_Main_Rollover_Special_Effect.content: Look at all the special items you can add to your design.

NAB_Toolbar_Main_Rollover_Stickers_NC.content: Check out all the incredible stickers that you can add to your picture!

NAB_Toolbar_Main_Rollover_Eraser_NC.content: Use this to get rid of any part of your picture

NAB_Toolbar_Main_Rollover_Nature Tools_N.content: Here’s where you’ll find different natural art tools to add color and shapes to your picture.

NAB_Toolbar_Main_Rollover_Save_NC.content: This is where you can save your artwork to the Gallery.

NAB_Toolbar_Main_Rollover_Backgrounds_NC.content: You can pick a natural background as your canvas here.

NAB_Toolbar_Brush_Crayon_Rollover_Crayon.content: Who doesn’t love a good crayon?

NAB_Toolbar_Main_Rollover_Brush_Crayon_N.content: Use the brushes and crayons to paint and draw in all sorts of cool colors!

NAB_Intro_Animation_2_Daisy.content: I love making art from leaves and feathers and other things I find in nature.

NAB_Intro_Animation_4_Hal.content: And we get to make a big mess, right!

NAB_Go_Back_Action_1_Daisy.content: Are you sure you want to quit working on that picture?
If you leave it won’t be here when you come back!

NAB_Art_Box_Cover_2_Daisy.content: I want to make my art box look just like my garden!

NAB_Art_Box_Cover_3_Squeeks.content: I’m thinking I’ll make mine feel like the beach!

NAB_Art_Box_Cover_4_Hal.content: I want to cover mine with mud and bury it in the backyard!

NAB_Box_Cover_Closed_NC.content: Just tap here and we’ll get started making nature art!

NAB_Box_Cover_Inactivity_Squeeks.content: This art isn’t going to make itself.

NAB_Tutorial_Options_Tool_Bar_2_Daisy.content: You can move the slider up and down to choose the size here.

NAB_Toolbar_Stickers_Displayed_Daisy.content: That sure is a lot of cool stickers!

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_A_Hal.content: Look at all these nature-y tools.
They’re all so nature-y and tool-y and all at the same time!

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_C_Squeeks.content: You’d be nuts not to add some seeds to your art.
Yeah it’s a pun, I said it.

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_D_NC.content: Those feathers are for the birdies!

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_G_7_Daisy.content: So much to choose from, it’s hard to decide!

NAB_Save_Pop_Up_Daisy.content: That’s such a great piece of art work

NAB_Save_Pop_Up_Inactivity_Daisy.content: If you decide that you don’t want to save it, tap the red x.

NAB_Save_Cover_Popup_NC.content: Do you want to save and replace what you had before?

NAB_Random_Inactivity_A_NC.content: It’s easy! Just pick a tool and see what it can do!

NAB_Random_Inactivity_B_Squeeks.content: Are you thinking about what to do next?

NAB_Random_Inactivity_C_Daisy.content: There are so many sweet nature tools,
it can be hard to choose where to begin.

NAB_Random_Inactivity_D_Hal.content: This is no time for nappin’!

NAB_Random_Inactivity_E_NC.content: I can’t wait to see what you’re going to make.

NAB_Random_Inactivity_G_Daisy.content: Let’s start another picture for the Gallery!

NAB_Random_Inactivity_H_Hal.content: Let’s make this art thing happen, baby!

NAB_Random_Encourage_A_NC.content: You really have a knack for creating nature art!

NAB_Random_Encourage_C_Daisy.content: I can’t wait to see what you do next!

NAB_Random_Encourage_D_Hal.content: I couldn’t have done it better myself!

NAB_Random_Encourage_F_Squeeks.content: This is going to look great in the Gallery

NAB_Random_Encourage_G_Daisy.content: Wow! This picture is going to be one of my favs!

NAB_Random_Encourage_H_Hal.content: This is going to be one of the most nature-iffic art works yet!

NAB_Pop_In_Animation_Toolbar_Special_Eff.content: We can really make our art work come to life with these special items!

NAB_Toolbar_Mud_Berries_Rollover_Flower.content: We can scatter flower petals here
